name: ContentFolderLink
description: Represents the link between a Salesforce CRM Content folder and where it's shared.
summary: The {ContentFolderLink} object in the {salesforce} application is used to link content folders to other entities. It has attributes such as Id (unique identifier), ParentEntityId (reference to the parent entity), ContentFolderId (reference to the content folder), IsDeleted (boolean indicating if the link has been deleted), and EnableFolderStatus (picklist for enabling folder status).
label: Content Folder Link
